fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Information

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: Are_you_submitting_the_application_under_the_ordinances_and_policies_in_effect_a
fields.fieldText: Are you submitting the application under the ordinances and policies in effect at the time the application is accepted for review by the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Please_specify_the_ordinance_s_and_or_policy_ies_including_version_s_under_which
fields.fieldText: Please specify the ordinance(s) and/or policy(ies), including version(s), under which the application is being submitted?

fields.name: Scope_of_Work
fields.fieldText: Provide a brief description of what is being proposed at this site

fields.name: Review_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Review information regarding the required Vegetation Protection Plan and the Tree Clearing Certificate exemption information here

fields.name: Are_you_seeking_to_amend_an_approved_Tree_Clearing_Certificate
fields.fieldText: Are you seeking to amend an approved Tree Clearing Certificate?

fields.name: Is_this_project_associated_with_an_approved_sub_division_site_plan_conditional_z
fields.fieldText: Is this project associated with an approved subdivision, site plan, conditional zoning, zoning compliance permit, erosion control permit, or similar development approval?

fields.name: Are_you_exempt_from_a_tree_clearing_Certificate_per_UDO_Chapter_2_3_28_c
fields.fieldText: Are you exempt from a Tree Clearing Certificate per UDO Chapter 2.3.28.c?

fields.name: Vegetation_Protection_Plan_Requirements
fields.fieldText:
Please ensure that your Vegetation Protection Site Plan meets the following conditions before submittal:


1. Plans are no larger than 24 inches by 36 inches, at an appropriate scale.


2. Vicinity map showing the location of the tract


3. Map of the entire tract, including property boundary by courses and distances with references to true meridian and the location and dimension of all on-site and adjacent off-site easements (such as drainage, utility, public access, aerial utility, conservation, permanent and temporary construction easements).


4. General information about the tract, including (but not limited) to:

- The owner of the tract

- The current zoning of the tract

- The area of the tract

- Any outstanding zoning conditions

- Any Master Development Plan requirements (if applicable)


5. Location and use(s) of all existing buildings on the tract


6. Owner, parcel #, current zoning, and present use of all contiguous properties (including property on opposite side of adjoining streets)


7. General classification of all existing and proposed adjacent roadways (as depicted in Clayton Transportation plan) and ultimate right of way boundaries associated with these roadways.


8. Location and width of all future/existing buffers and associated vegetation protection areas, including riparian buffers, perimeter buffers and perimeter streetscapes.


9. Proposed limits of timbering activities, including the location and extent of all tree protection areas as required under section 155.402(H)(4)

fields.name: Does_your_Vegetation_Protection_Site_Plan_meet_the_conditions_above
fields.fieldText: Does your Vegetation Protection Site Plan meet the conditions above?
